targets.query:
from(bucket: "rrc_measurements")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "RrcMeasurementReport" and r.IsServingCell == "true"
  and
    (
      ("${UE}" == "All" or r.UEID == "${UE}" or contains(value: r.UEID, set: ${UE:json}))
    )
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      NrCellIdField: r.NrCellId,
      UEIDField: r.UEID
  }))
  |> pivot(
      rowKey: ["_time", "NrCellIdField", "UEIDField"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true) 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
      r with
      "SSB RSRP": float(v: r.SsbRsrp) - 157.0,
      "SSB RSRQ": (float(v: r.SsbRsrq) / 2.0) - 43.0,
      "SSB SINR": (float(v: r.SsbSinr) / 2.0) - 23.0
  }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "NrCellIdField", "UEIDField", "SSB RSRP", "SSB RSRQ", "SSB SINR"])

from(bucket: "rrc_measurements")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "RrcMeasurementReport") 
  |> group(columns: ["UEID"])
  |> distinct(column: "UEID")
  |> group() 
  |> count(column: "UEID")

from(bucket: "throughput_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "AccGTPThpDl" and
    r._field == "Value" and
    (
      "${UE}" == "All" or r.UEID == "${UE}" or contains(value: r.UEID, set: ${UE:json})
    )
  )
  |> group(columns: ["UEID"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      UEID: r.UEID, 
      "UE:": r._value * 8
  }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false) 
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "UEID", "UE:"])

timestart = uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)
timestop = uint(v: v.timeRangeStop)
duration = duration(v:timestop - timestart)

conditionalAggregate = (tables=<-) => 
  if int(v:duration) > int(v:15m) then
    tables
      |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
      |> fill(usePrevious: true) 
  else
    tables

from(bucket: "rrc_measurements")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "RrcMeasurementReport" and
    r.IsServingCell == "true" and
    r._field == "SsbRsrp" and
    (
      "${UE}" == "All" or r.UEID == "${UE}" or contains(value: r.UEID, set: ${UE:json})
    )
  )
  |> conditionalAggregate()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      UEID: r.UEID,
      NrCellId: r.NrCellId,
      "_value": float(v: r._value) - 157.0
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "UEID", "NrCellId", "_value"])

from(bucket: "throughput_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "AccGTPThpUl" and
    r._field == "Value" and
    (
      "${UE}" == "All" or r.UEID == "${UE}" or contains(value: r.UEID, set: ${UE:json})
    )
  )
  |> group(columns: ["UEID"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      UEID: r.UEID, 
      "UE:": r._value * 8
  }))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false) 
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "UEID", "UE:"])

timestart = uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)
timestop = uint(v: v.timeRangeStop)
duration = duration(v:timestop - timestart)

conditionalAggregate = (tables=<-) => 
  if int(v:duration) > int(v:15m) then
    tables
      |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
      |> fill(usePrevious: true) 
  else
    tables

from(bucket: "rrc_measurements")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "RrcMeasurementReport" and
    r.IsServingCell == "true" and
    r._field == "SsbSinr" and
    (
      "${UE}" == "All" or r.UEID == "${UE}" or contains(value: r.UEID, set: ${UE:json})
    )
  )
  |> conditionalAggregate()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      UEID: r.UEID,
      NrCellId: r.NrCellId,
      "_value": (float(v: r._value)/2.0)-23.0 
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "UEID", "NrCellId", "_value"])

timestart = uint(v: v.timeRangeStart)
timestop = uint(v: v.timeRangeStop)
duration = duration(v:timestop - timestart)

conditionalAggregate = (tables=<-) => 
  if int(v:duration) > int(v:15m) then
    tables
      |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
      |> fill(usePrevious: true) 
  else
    tables

from(bucket: "rrc_measurements")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "RrcMeasurementReport" and
    r._field == "SsbRsrq" and
    r.IsServingCell == "true" and
    (
      "${UE}" == "All" or r.UEID == "${UE}" or contains(value: r.UEID, set: ${UE:json})
    )
  )
  |> conditionalAggregate()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      UEID: r.UEID,
      NrCellId: r.NrCellId,
      "_value": (float(v: r._value)/2.0)-43.0 
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "UEID", "NrCellId", "_value"])

panels.description: Aggregated SSB RSRP for Connected UEs

targets.query:
from(bucket: "rrc_measurements")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "RrcMeasurementReport" and
    r.IsServingCell == "true" and
    r._field == "SsbRsrp"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["NrCellId"])  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      NrCellId: r.NrCellId,
      "NrCellId:": float(v: r._value) - 157.0
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "NrCellId", "NrCellId:"])

panels.title: SSB RSRP

    r.IsServingCell == "true" and
    r._field == "SsbSinr"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["NrCellId"])  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      NrCellId: r.NrCellId,
      "NrCellId:":  (float(v: r._value) / 2.0) - 23.0
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "NrCellId", "NrCellId:"])

panels.title: SSB RSRQ

list.definition:
from(bucket: "rrc_measurements")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "RrcMeasurementReport") 
  |> keep(columns: ["UEID"]) 
  |> distinct(column: "UEID")
  |> sort(columns: ["UEID"], desc: false)
list.name: UE

query.query:
from(bucket: "rrc_measurements")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "RrcMeasurementReport") 
  |> keep(columns: ["UEID"]) 
  |> distinct(column: "UEID")
  |> sort(columns: ["UEID"], desc: false)
